patient_info: Purpura,Skin rash,Muscle weakness,Ascites,Thrombocytopenia,Anemia,Fever,Leukocytosis,Hepatomegaly,Vertigo,Low back pain,Increased total bilirubin,Recurrent thromboembolism,Respiratory tract infection,Abnormal urinary color,Abnormal erythroid lineage cell morphology,Abnormal granulocytopoietic cell morphology,Hemophagocytosis,Lower limb pain,Gastric varix,Portal vein thrombosis,Productive cough,Hypercoagulability
golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Thrombotic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (TTP)
2. Hemophagocytic Lymphohistiocytosis (HLH)
3. Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APS)
4. Hemolytic Uremic Syndrome (HUS)
5. Malignancy
6. Infectious disease
7. Atypical hemolytic anemia
8. Thrombotic occlusion of blood vessels
9. Disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC)
10. Medication-induced or systemic side effects.
